Birthday song lyrics

Under Construction

Year 1: It didn't take long - Monster - now you're strong!

Year 2: In cold and heat - Monster - cannot be beat!

Year 3: Over seas and sand - Monster - the best in the land!

Year 4: The fun never ends - Monster - the best of friends!

Year 5: Through the years - Monster - has no more fears
